column4: Hello, i'm running Ubuntu on my Dell laptop, and it works super! But there always comes a beep when I press the back button if there is no text.. how can I turn this off?
Hello, i'm running Ubuntu on my Dell laptop, and it works super! But there always comes a beep when I press the back button if there is no text.. how can I turn this off?
not your actual speaker but your PC SPEAKER
